channel.title: ArmyPkz Looking for Coder/Hoster [PI] ECO [317]!
channel.description:
Hello guy's it's Cody here and I decided to make a PI Server so apply now or miss all the fun!
I've been wanting to make a server for year's and now here i am doing it and i need some help!
What I am for in this server is perfect combat, to make all of our player's happy and to have a all around awesome server
Once we get donation's It will all go to the server and it's improvement no matter what, I need a very good hoster who can guarantee a 24/7 stability satisfaction!
Here is the layout i prefer you use to apply! In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: MSN: What position do you want? (Coder,Hoster): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?:
Coder's get admin
I Also need a GFX Designer!
Coder's 0/2
Ok Thank's Guy's!

item.title: ArmyPkz Looking for Coder/Hoster [PI] ECO [317]!
item.dc:creator: @Slayerscape101 Slayerscape101
item.description:
@Slayerscape101 wrote:

Hello guy’s it’s Cody here and I decided to make a PI Server so apply now or miss all the fun!

I’ve been wanting to make a server for year’s and now here i am doing it and i need some help!

What I am for in this server is perfect combat, to make all of our player’s happy and to have a all around awesome server

Once we get donation’s It will all go to the server and it’s improvement no matter what, I need a very good hoster who can guarantee a 24/7 stability satisfaction!

Here is the layout i prefer you use to apply!
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?:
How old are you?:
MSN:
What position do you want? (Coder,Hoster):
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?:
What time zone are you in?:
How long will you be on everyday?:
Why do you want to become part of this server?:

Coder’s get admin

I Also need a GFX Designer!

Ok Thank’s Guy’s!
